typegen:aura:cmp.description: Generate component types that can be used in your controller and helper files to improve auto-complete and correctness

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

apextypespath.name: apextypespath
apextypespath.description: Path to typing directory that holds compatible types for AuraEnabled properties in Apex controllers and classes

output.name: output
output.description: Path to typing output directory, typically embedded in the project '.sfdx' directory

typegen:aura:helper.description: Export types from existing Helper.ts files, should preserve typing information from the functions and properties and export to usable declarations

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

file.name: file
file.description: Glob pattern for helper typescript files, [force-app/**/aura/**/*Helper.ts]

output.name: output
output.description: Path to an output destination for generated d.ts files
